snippet.title: PowBall Renaissance Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Brick-breaking retro action Arkanoid fans will love. Breakout with weapons, farming, shop, sub-games, permadeath, 1 to 3 players.

Try for free on Android:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.powgames.PowBallRenDemo

On PC:
https://powgames.itch.io/powball-renaissance

Also on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/654600/
